settings.title: Diamonds by Raymond Lee: Our Story
settings.subtitle: Diamonds by Raymond Lee, in Boca Raton, Florida, has been a trusted name in luxury jewelry for over 40 years. As a family-owned business, we pride ourselves on integrity, personalized service, and exceptional quality. Whether buying an engagement ring or selling a timepiece, we offer a concierge-level experience for jewelry and watch lovers.

settings.title: Contact Information
settings.heading: Get In Touch With Us
settings.subheading: If you wish to directly reach us, Please fill out the for below-

settings.heading: A Family Legacy in Boca Raton

settings.text: Founded in 1983 by Jeff Josephson, Raymond Lee Jewelers began as a family-owned business in Boca Raton, built on trust and quality. Over the years, two generations of the Josephson family have upheld Jeff’s values of honesty, integrity, and exceptional service. In 2016, they expanded by opening Diamonds by Raymond Lee in East Boca Raton, transforming the iconic Boca Diner site into a modern jewelry destination. Today, under the leadership of Jeff’s nephew, Dan Josephson, Diamonds by Raymond Lee is recognized as South Florida’s diamond destination, offering GIA-certified diamonds, designer bridal jewelry, and luxury watches.

settings.title: Luxury Jewelry and Concierge ‑ Level Service
settings.content: At Diamonds by Raymond Lee, luxury is our standard. We offer exclusive, one-of-a-kind jewelry and timepieces in a comfortable, elegant Boca Raton showroom.From the moment you arrive, our expert team provides personalized service, guiding you through our selection. For unique pieces, our skilled artisans create custom designs, using only the finest diamonds, gemstones, and metals to craft timeless creations.

settings.title: Trusted Experts in Jewelry and Watch Buying
settings.content: Diamonds by Raymond Lee is one of the nation’s largest and most trusted buyers of luxury goods, specializing in diamonds, estate jewelry, and luxury watches. We offer top cash offers with a transparent, no-pressure approach, ensuring fair market value for every item, from individual pieces to entire collections. For buyers, our showroom offers an extensive selection of GIA-certified diamonds, engagement rings, fine estate jewelry, and luxury watches from brands like Rolex, Patek Philippe, and Cartier. All items are vetted for authenticity and quality, and with new pieces arriving daily, every visit is a chance to discover something unique. Our on-site master jewelers and watchmakers provide expert repair, restoration, and appraisal services.

settings.title: Commitment to Community and Integrity
settings.content: Diamonds by Raymond Lee has been a cornerstone of the Boca Raton community for years, giving back through local initiatives and events like our Diamonds & Donuts car show and annual Toy Drive, which supports the Boys & Girls Club. We also organize hurricane relief drives and partner with veterans and animal rescue organizations.Our commitment extends to creating the Boca Aquarium, a free aquatic experience in our showroom where families can enjoy live coral reefs and marine life. This blend of family legacy and community engagement defines us as more than just a jeweler.Integrity is the foundation of our business. We prioritize honesty, transparency, and ethical practices, aiming to earn lasting trust. Our reputation for fair value and quality has led to multi-generational relationships, with families returning to us for decades, confident in our commitment to service and trust.

settings.title: Experience the Diamonds by Raymond Lee Difference
settings.content: After over 40 years, our family’s passion for fine jewelry and watches remains stronger than ever. We help clients celebrate life’s special moments with the perfect piece, offering a concierge-level experience, luxury jewelry, and Rolex watches. Visit our stunning showroom at 2801 N. Federal Highway, Boca Raton, or schedule a private consultation. Discover the exceptional service and exquisite collection that have made Diamonds by Raymond Lee a trusted name in luxury jewelry since 1983. Join our family’s tradition of excellence and elegance.
